actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend the temporary duty suspension on certain knitting machines and parts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on circular and power driven flat knitting machines and parts. Extends, through December 31, 1994, the suspension of duty on: (1) hosiery knitting machines and parts; and (2) needles for knitting machines.

titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary duty suspension on certain knitting machines and parts, and for other purposes.
